normalized: after linking back up with annerose, it felt like we'dbeen heading deeper and deeper underground for two or three hours.
when suddenly a city revealed itself like magic in the subterranean space.

name: miki
normalized: oh, wow!
miki exclaims in surprise.

name: rikurou
normalized: so this is kouten tower…"
i have to pick my jaw up off the floor too as i take in the sight before me.
it's huge.
the ceiling's gotta be at least 10 meters up there.
rows of whipstitched three story buildings extend off into the distance, ostensibly erected after the massive cavern was dug out.
each one of them helps constitute a red light district of brothels and bars.
the underground city is teeming with life and packed with people to the point i have no idea how they all managed to fit in here.

name: annerose
normalized: that's right, this is kouten tower.
she says without any particular attachment.

name: annerose
normalized: the place is doing pretty well for itself for just a hole in the ground.

name: rikurou
normalized: there are so many people down here.
i thought for sure everyone'd be up on the tops floors or something.

name: annerose
normalized: they say it started out as an experimental undergound city 80 floors above ground, 30 below that connected toothers in the area through underground passages.

name: rikurou
normalized: i see…"

name: annerose
normalized: --and now, it all belongs to that aishe.
she shrugs with a rather put-off expression.

name: rikurou
normalized: aishe must've been quite the big shot to be in chargeof all this bustle, huh?

name: annerose
normalized: no, she's not!
she only knows how to screw people over.
now, she's going to be just up ahead.
in the most vile place down here.
annerose tells us to follow with a jerk of her chin and walks on ahead.
we continue for about thirty minutes through the busiest part of the underground, and pass through a large gate at the end.
there's an even larger throng of people here accompanied by the din of endless cheering.
but what was happening on the inside of the gate couldn't have been more different from the outside.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…"
what we found beyond the massive gate was a dome-shaped area.
a stone platform occupies its center, surrounded by seats for spectators and an electronic scoreboard hanging upon the wall.
the seats are densely packed with people cheering, shouting, and occasionally waving their arms around, all focused on the arena.
and what was happening there--

name: miki
normalized: there are women… fighting…?
miki said in a trembling voice.
indeed, two beautiful women were battling it out on stage with sharp swords in hand.
their pictures alongside supposed odds are displayed on the scoreboard.
i'm left speechless by the unimaginable sight.

name: miki
normalized: kyah!
miki covers her face with her hands.

name: rikurou
normalized: agh…"
the black-haired woman had cut off the blonde one's arm.
bright red blood gushes forth, and the defeated fighter collapses.
the crowd explodes into wild cheers.
the scoreboard changes to display the winner.
it seems the battle is over.
the winner, drunk on the madness of the fight, brandishes her bloody sword on high.
the cheers enveloping the arena swell even louder like that had stoked their excitement.

name: annerose
normalized: do you get it now?
annerose says with a furrowed brow.
i didn't have to ask what she meant.

name: rikurou
normalized: they're betting on the matches…?
i squeeze the words from my dry mouth.

name: annerose
normalized: if that were all it'd be fine.
but it's also a show where the loser gets raped by the audience.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!?
i'm once again left speechless as annerose continues.

name: annerose
normalized: they bring in poor, married couples and put the husband on a quiz show with his wife on the line.
if he doesn't get all the questions right…"
annerose stops there as if to say, "you can guess what happens next.
and i have no desire to ask anything further, either.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah…"
i turn back to the arena to find the combatant who had her arm cut off being carried away on a stretcher.

name: annerose
normalized: she won't be raped until they take care of her arm.
whoknows whether you'd call that lucky or not, though.
annerose said in a sympathetic voice.

name: rikurou
normalized: i think i'm going to be sick.
oh, what an awful thing to say.
i'm hurt.
i turn around at the familiar voice.
and there was aishe.
the ruler, and queen of kouten tower.

name: aishe
normalized: hello anne, rikurou.
and this must be that miki everyone's been talking about.
miki looks down in fear under aishe's gaze.

name: aishe
normalized: oh, my… not even a hello for our first meeting?
i'm hurt…"
she says in a tone that she's not hurt in the slightest, just as she did a moment earlier.

name: annerose
normalized: if you don't want to get hurt, you'll put an end to this disgusting show right now.
annerose says with her arms crossed.

name: aishe
normalized: hmhm♪
you're always so adorable, anne♪
aishe giggles to herself.

name: annerose
normalized: having you call me adorable creeps me out.
and quit with the whole 'anne' thing.
how many times do i have to tell you?

name: aishe
normalized: the only reason i do it is because you're so shy about it, anne.
hmhmhm♪
i dont know if it's the way she laughs or her demeanor or what, but aishe has a more venomous air about her than before.
perhaps it's because this place is her stronghold, or maybe it's from seeing that repulsive show a second ago.
either way, seeing as she's the boss of this place, that fight just now happened because of her.
i think i understand now why annerose said she didn't want to come out here.
a "slash first ask questions later" type of person like annerose doesn't strike me as someone who'd be good at dealing with aishe, who's always toying with people.
they're supposedly childhood friends, but i really wonder how their time together went.
more than likely, they weren't very happy memories for annerose.
after smiling for a bit at annerose who looked like she'd crunched into a stinkbug…

name: aishe
normalized: and so, what brings you here today?
come to ask me out on a date, perhaps?
anytime's okay with me.
i wouldn't mind a threesome with rikurou, either.
annerose completely ignores that (though it secretly got my heart thumping a little), before continuing.

name: annerose
normalized: we're here about your professional services.
the divining ones.

name: aishe
normalized: oh, this is a surprise.
anne's asking me for a favor.
did you get caught up in some sort of trouble?
i'm worried about you～.
aishe makes a feigned look of surprise.

name: annerose
normalized: acting like you don't already know… i'll cut to the chase.
i want to know where barde barde is.
her eyes quietly narrow.
it's scary.

name: aishe
normalized: that's what you're asking of me?

name: annerose
normalized: that's what i'm asking of you.
their stares clash.
aishe cracks a smile and looks miki over.

name: aishe
normalized: all this trouble for one little girl…"
she says in an icy voice.
miki hides behind me.

name: rikurou
normalized: miki…"
aishe glances at me.

name: aishe
normalized: hmm… i don't like it.
she crosses her arms and vapidly taps her foot.

name: annerose
normalized: are you going to divine for us or not?
aishe returns her gaze to annerose and seductively smiles once more.

name: aishe
normalized: you're so impatient.
i'd love to help you out, seeing as you came all the way out here and all…"
annerose silently awaits aishe's answer.

name: aishe
normalized: hmm, what to do…?
i don't like messing with men who aren't my type…"

name: rikurou
normalized: um… if it's about money…"

name: aishe
normalized: rikurou, i don't need money.
take a look around.
i'm not hurting for money even in the slightest.
aishe sounds like she's talking to some simpleton as she sweeps her eyes across the coliseum.
the next round of betting had already begun and the crowdwas raising lust-filled cheers.

name: annerose
normalized: then what is it you want?

name: aishe
normalized: pretending like you don't know♪
the thing i love most is seeing your face twisted in agony.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…!?
i look with surprise at annerose.
she's keeping her cool, but her temples are twitching.
and so, i get an idea of what their past was like.
in short, annerose getting worked over by aishe's ill-intentioned games.

name: annerose
normalized: …so what is it you have in mind?
think you can spell it out a little more clearly?

name: aishe
normalized: let's see… i recently acquired a very interesting slave.
she's quite the beauty.
a real find.

name: aishe
normalized: how about having you and her star in the last show of the night?
rikurou will play a part, too, of course.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!
the show where they fight on stage and the loser gets raped by the audience?
and i'm taking part on top of it!?

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!
annerose silences me as i'm about to protest.

name: annerose
normalized: and if i say no?

name: aishe
normalized: then have fun finding barde barde on your own.
amidahara's a big place, you know.

name: annerose
normalized: and if i don't go along with this, you're probably going to tell barde anyway.
or have you already?

name: aishe
normalized: hmm, i wonder.
it all depends on your answer, my dear little anne.

name: rikurou
normalized: …annerose.
as i find myself giving her an uneasy look, annerose lets out a heavy sigh.

name: annerose
normalized: looks like we've got no choice but to go along with this schemer.

name: rikurou
normalized: …alright.

name: aishe
normalized: oh, wonderful♪
that's my old anne♪

name: annerose
normalized: you're too kind.
annerose responds with an expression lacking the slightesttrace of amusement.
it brought a beaming smile to aishe, just as she'd said a moment ago.
she then spoke to one of her nearby attendants.
and after a short wait, a tough-looking woman was led in.

name: aishe
normalized: allow me to introduce you.
this is my new slave… and your opponent for this evening.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah…!
it was the last person i ever expected.

name: annerose
normalized: mayfeng!?

name: mayfeng
normalized: annerose!?
even annerose can't contain her shock.
yes, it was mayfeng.
what is she doing here!?
and why is she aishe's slave!?
mayfeng's going to be our opponent!?
they glare at one another.
annerose is cool as usual.
but mayfeng in an out of character move doesn't even try to conceal her wrath.

name: aishe
normalized: hmhm, you two always were like cats and dogs, weren't you?
then i'll keep things short.
it finally sinks in from seeing how much fun she's havingwith this.

name: rikurou
normalized: (she knew everything from the start when she proposed this gamble.
she really is twisted.
but still, what on earth is mayfeng doing as aishe's slave?
no, wait… what did end up happening to her back then?
i was taken out by her poison so i don't remember all that well.

name: annerose
normalized: never thought i'd see mayfeng as a slave.
annerose stopped her glaring match at aishe's giggle and turned to face her.

name: aishe
normalized: if a woman gets knocked out in this town it won't even be five minutes before she's sold off.
that's just the way it goes.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah…!
i remember now.
it was me who knocked her out with immortal power.
no, more accurately, she barely dodged my attempt to kill her and only got knocked out.
and since annerose naturally left her behind to lug me back to the magic temple…
any "leftovers" would've been easy pickings for any armed refugees watching from the shadows.

name: rikurou
normalized: (maybe it's not such a good thing she survived after all…)
i peek over at mayfeng to find her shooting me a withering glare after my little chirp.

name: mayfeng
normalized: i owe you for back then, kid.
you can bet your immortal life we're going to get even.

name: rikurou
normalized: a-ack…"
i've earned the wrath of a woman you don't want to mess around with.
i knew i should've finished her off back then…

name: rikurou
normalized: (no, this is all because i went overboard and blew my onlychance.
damn it, what was i thinking…?

name: aishe
normalized: don't worry, rikurou.
she's a slave now.

name: aishe
normalized: once someone gets sold off, the amidahara slave association strips them of their freedom.

name: aishe
normalized: as far as she's concerned, she'll be a slave the rest of her life until she pays off the association and me.

name: aishe
normalized: in other words unless her master, yours truly, gives her permission, she cannot take her revenge.
aishe amusedly explains what it means to be a slave.

name: rikurou
normalized: uh… so like, if you do give her permission, she gets the go ahead to come after us?

name: aishe
normalized: don't worry.
that's not going to happen.

name: rikurou
normalized: so essentially her thirst for revenge is going to keep building until she's freed…"

name: aishe
normalized: aha, i'd expect nothing less from anne's immortal.
you've got the right idea, rikurou♪

name: rikurou
normalized: (th-that's not exactly encouraging…)

name: annerose
normalized: rick, you're just going to get worn out dealing with aishe.
leave her alone.
annerose decides to throw me a rescue line from seeing me getting toyed with.

name: rikurou
normalized: okay… actually come to think of it, aren't i a slave, too?
it just popped into my head for a second.

name: annerose
normalized: no.
i took care of that before you were officially registered.
you belong only to me.

name: rikurou
normalized: i-i see…"
…still, isn't that more or less the same thing?

name: mayfeng
normalized: you two never change.
your pathetic little back and forths always make me want to puke.
mayfeng spits like she can't keep her anger in check.

name: annerose
normalized: i wish i could say the same for you.
still, i think your new occupation suits you wonderfully, mayfeng.

name: mayfeng
normalized: i swear i'll have my revenge!
remember that!

name: annerose
normalized: i only hope the day comes soon.

name: aishe
normalized: mayfeng, i have a present for you, regarding that.
you, annerose and rikurou will be starring in the finale for tonight.

name: annerose
normalized: …tch.
annerose quietly clicks her tongue.
she probably hates being mentioned in the same breath as mayfeng.

name: mayfeng
normalized: you have my gratitude, lady aishe!
i swear to publicly humiliate this woman!
mayfeng on the other hand doesn't even try to hide her excitement for revenge.

name: aishe
normalized: hmhm, now let me finish.
we're not having a fight between you two.
it's a test of skill for mister immortal here.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!?
a test of skill… for me?
what's going on here!?
what's aishe going to do to us!?

name: aishe
normalized: it's going to be spectacular, rikurou♪
aishe wears a smile befitting the ruler of kouten tower.
a smile of seduction and cruelty.
